entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 02 May 2016
